spec_data.Name: texlive-scrlttr2copy
spec_data.Description:
The file copy.lco provides the new class option "copy" for the
KOMA-Script letter class scrlttr2. If the option "copy" is
given, all pages of a specific letter are duplicated with
background text marking as copies.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 08:13:59 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A letter class option file for the automatic creation of copies
